about_the_game:
Mrs. Chen, the mother of Jesse Chen, is asked to pick up some documents; these documents reside at the University of Tokyo where she used to work. Upon her picking up these documents, she engages with audio recordings and diary entries that tells her what exactly took place in the experimentation room.

Follow Mrs. Chen and discover more about the world of Let Them Breathe. In this walking simulation and collectable game, you will explore a small abandoned laboratory. Within the different compartments of the library, you will find items in which you will be able to engage with such as recordings, and documents in which you have to collect so as to win the game.

In this casual short game with a spice of thriller, the atmosphere allows for the player to walk the environment to discover what took place within various locations of the game. The player will find out more about the location, and the two individuals who once occupied the space prior to the player's arrival.

Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother is a video game that takes place within the Let Them Breathe franchise. It tells the story of Mrs. Chen who is the mother of one of the characters in the indie web series and even the indie movie, Let Them Breathe: City on the Ocean.
detailed_description:
06/21/2024

We have another winner to Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother Speed Run Event: GandaCu. Feel free to watch the video below; we sent him a comment and hopefully we can work out his prize soon!


06/08/2024

We were hoping to set up a pre-record of the speed run of the winner but it seems it may be too advanced for our small team at the moment so instead, here is the speedrun. This winner was the sole participate of the event but hey, even so, they got a cash prize:

Let Them Breathe: Selena's Awakening is our next project scheduled for September 2nd, 2024. We hope to have the game play trailer out on the 17th so you all can add it to your wish list.


Buzz

We have a WINNER for the Speed Run Event. The winner will be announced the same day we announced the title of the upcoming game currently in production. So expect later this month!


03/02/2024, 09:07 PM CDT

This game does not have a tutorial. To play the game, one must think of the general mechanics of a PC game. For instance, if the mouse clicker is hidden on your screen when starting the game then click the 'windows' icon on your computer so as the mouse can appear.


03/8/2024, 11:44 AM CDT

We're quite please to see the good reviews for Hello Mother. And yes, we also saw the discussion on the page; for a game to be submitted on , a player needs to request it. Now we could request it ourselves but that would mean we would also have to participate within the run's contest.


04/23/2024, 5:43pm CDT

It has come to our attention one can not submit the game to Speed Run unless they are a well known user. As a result of this finding, if submitting to the speed run event:

1.) Upload to Youtube
2.) Email or comment the Youtube Link to us


03/17/2024, 12:52 PM CDT

So glad so many are enjoying the game! Also there will be no more updates for this game. We are in the mist of working on our next game. Still, good luck to all those who enter into the contest!

name: Let Them Breathe: Hello Mother

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx 11 or 12
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 0141 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx 11 or 12
  • DirectX: Version 11
